starting to get the sense that nancy pelosi is bad at politics
@zachlieberman Oh man I had exactly the opposite experience, felt really intuitive, would love to use it if I was teaching a computer class for children again
@xeni @digitalsista All I did was make some data viz at a good time. :) Ben Popken at NBC sourced the dataset, great analysis in order to make the viz by folks at Neo4j

@xeni I was at a news organization doing Twitter analysis / news stories at the time that was happening, and if anyone should have caught it would have been us, and we were totally oblivious. Anyone who thinks they know better is fooling themselves. Sending good energy your way.

@xeni One of the most surprising things from the Russian Bot Tweet dataset I worked with at NBC was how involved they were in left-leaning hashtags on Twitter, they jumped heavily into #blacklivesmatter with accounts posing as both sides https://t.co/308BGDFKol https://t.co/TwxbTxUc1D

@xeni The russian interest in stoking racial division is really interesting to me. It's like it's just another zero-day they picked up off the wall, it's such an easy way to hack a conversation and take things off the rails, I never got the sense they actually cared one way or another
i grow weary

We should just drive a start up bus across the country for a year and town by town and business by business teach and build tools for people to decouple from tech corporations that have sold them out.

It might be schadenfreude but I very much enjoy the idea of a Facebook developer suddenly not having access to an API that they depend on day to day. Feels bad, huh? 

*gestures to vast wasteland of old Facebook data and APIs I can no longer access* https://t.co/6V5GSOZYNM

I am learning to deal with intense discomfort/pain/embarassment better.
@wilw I can't tell you how comforting that is in this moment.
It looks like my Internet is broken. Think I'm gonna watch Alpha Dog.
Favorite band: Jonas Brothers... Favorite movie: Twilight... I guess I am talking to a teenage girl.
I am in an incredibly good mood. So happy. Dunno why. It's great, though.
I see snow falling.
I just want to write a million songs.
Going to go to sleep. I am not sad. Or angry. I feel clean & new. It's wonderful. Freeing. And I can't wait to photograph some bands Friday
I am so. so. so. so. so. so. so. so. tired.
